list_translation_mean.translate_mean: vơ vẫn làm mất thì giờ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the natural satellite of the earth, visible (chiefly at night) by reflected light from the sun.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there was no moon, but a sky sparkling with brilliant stars
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Không có mặt trăng, nhưng một bầu trời lấp lánh với những ngôi sao rực rỡ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: behave or move in a listless and aimless manner.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: lying in bed eating candy, mooning around
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nằm trên giường ăn kẹo, trăng tròn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: expose one's buttocks to (someone) in order to insult or amuse them.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Dan had whipped around, bent over, and mooned the crowd
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Dan đã quất quanh, cúi xuống, và Mooned đám đông
